title: Science Domain Information Literacy Enhancement Training for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic academic resource retrieval
context.additional_context: Short-term concentration-enhancement course for science professionals, designed around hands-on practice using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible scientific literature from academic databases with 90% accuracy
Learners can utilize a source verification framework at an 80% application rate to assess the credibility of research topics
Learners can execute a three-step process to critically analyze scientific claims in information-overloaded environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
